p: Second, the 22 remaining descriptors from the four categories ( Appendix A, Table A1) have been used to perform two PCAs. The first PCA ( Appendix A, Figure A1) was performed on 60 trials, including all variables regarding space occupation by L. humile and its ability to exploit resources, to reveal contrasts between tests with L. humile (i) alone, (ii) facing La. neglectus and (iii) facing La. niger. The second PCA ( Appendix A, Figure A2) was performed on 48 trials, including all variables regarding the aggressiveness of L. humile and strength of the competition by the other species, to reveal contrasts between tests with L. humile facing (i) La. neglectus and (ii) La. niger.
